definitions.definition: A geographic region in the northeast of South Asia today divided between Bangladesh and India (particularly the state of West Bengal ).

main_definition: A geographic region in the northeast of South Asia today divided between Bangladesh and India (particularly the state of West Bengal ).

definitions.definition: A short-haired domestic cat of a particular breed that originated in the United States .
( American football ) A player on the team The Cincinnati Bengals .
examples: Jones became a Bengal in a trade for Smith.

main_definition: A short-haired domestic cat of a particular breed that originated in the United States .
secondary_definitions: ( American football ) A player on the team The Cincinnati Bengals .
